entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:17 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 07:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -34.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
